name: BERA TECH
description: I am BERA TECH WhatsApp MultiDevice Bot built in NodeJs to enhance the experience.

SESSION_ID.description: Ensure your session Id starts with the word BERA-TECH$

MODE.description: Write public or private to set bot mode

ANTI_DELETE.description: Set to true for anti delete

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Set to true if you want bot to view status

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: Set to true to auto reply after viewing status

AUTO_READ.description: Set to true to enable auto read messages

AUTO_TYPING.description: Set to true to show typing status

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Set to true to show recording status

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Set to true to keep bot always online

AUTO_BIO.description: Set to true to enable auto bio updates every 10 minutes
